item.description:
Hello - this looks like a fun event to support the CMHC Foundation:

["The CMHC Foundation supports the needs of the patients of the Connecticut Mental Health Center, an urban community mental health center, located in New Haven, Connecticut with an exceptional tradition of serving individuals with serious mental illness and addictions. Founded in 1966, CMHC treats individuals suffering from severe and persistent psychosis, depression, anxiety, addictions and those with co-existing mental health and addiction problems."]


Here's the summary of the event:

"An afternoon of beer tasting and tasty pizza along with a symposium of beer making from Bru Room Brewmaster, Jeff Browning.

Live music provided by New Haven's own Steven Pertesis

$20 in advance, $25 at the door.

Includes a sampling of all of Jeff's award winning beers and BAR famous pizza. Tour the beer
making facility and learn how these delicious beers are crafted.

(21 and over only.)"

I'll post the actual poster in the 'files' section to the left of the page.

I (or an anouced hh rep) can collect checks/cash to send in at once if people like, or they can register themselves by sending a check to Susan Woodall at:

CMHC Foundation
34 Park St.
Room 142
New Haven, CT 06519.

(Make the check out to CMHC Foundation.)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be outside at 4pm if people want to find me easily - call my cell at 203-314-4329 after that to figure out where we are.
item.name: Charity Beer Tasting/Symposium (with pizza!)
